H2.text: where are english speakers distributed. Australia

H3.text: where are english speakers distributed. Canada

A4.text: It is the common language used in government, education, and commerce in all 50 states, the District of Columbia, and in all U.S. territories except Puerto Rico.

A5.text: In 2024, about 247.7 million Americans, aged five or above, spoke English at home, a majority (77%) of the total U.S. population aged five and over.
